prodInfo.title: Where can I sell a broken laptop in Miami?
prodInfo.text: No matter the condition of your laptop — scratched, non-functional, water-damaged, or even brand-new — we review each case individually and will always make you a cash offer. Below, you’ll find three simple steps to get your laptop valued in just a few minutes.

easySteps.title: How to Sell Your Laptop Quickly in Miami?
easySteps.text: To save you the hassle of visiting pawn shops or spending time listing your device on marketplaces, we’ve created a simple online valuation process. Once you send us photos of your laptop, we’ll provide you with a cash offer. You can be confident that the price will remain the same when we meet in person.

contentStep1.stepText: Send photos and your laptop model through any convenient messaging app.

contentStep2.stepText: Schedule an on‑site or in‑office evaluation at a time that works for you.

contentStep3.stepText: Receive instant payment — cash, bank transfer, or check.

list.title: Instant cash offers – Get paid immediately after our team evaluates your laptop.
Complete Miami-Dade coverage – We travel to every neighborhood, from Brickell to Homestead.
Total privacy guaranteed – Your personal information and transaction details remain completely confidential.
Multiple payment options – Choose cash, Zelle, Venmo, or direct deposit on the spot.
Zero travel costs – Free pickup service throughout the area, no hidden charges.

feedback.content: Was really happy with how everything went selling my laptop in Miami. The tech showed up about 40 minutes late, but they made it right by adding an extra $50 to the offer. That kind of customer service is rare these days.
feedback.name: Alex P.

feedback.content: Overall a solid experience selling my laptop near me. They came out the same day just a few hours after I reached out. The only downside was they knocked a little off the price because the charger cable was loose, but I guess that’s fair.
feedback.name: Maria G.

feedback.content: Got cash for my used laptop in Miami and couldn’t be happier. The offer here was way better than what people were giving me on Facebook Marketplace. Quick and easy process.

listAsq.title: Is my personal information safe?
listAsq.content: Yeah, we completely wipe everything before reselling or scrapping. Your photos, emails, passwords - all gone for good. We use professional data deletion tools, not just the regular delete button. Your privacy is safe with us.

listAsq.title: How can I get more money for my laptop?
listAsq.content: Keep the original charger and box if you have them - that's an easy $20-50 extra. Clean it up before we come, wipe down the screen and keyboard. If you have the receipt or warranty info, bring that too. Gaming laptops and MacBooks in good shape always get top dollar.

listAsq.title: How quickly can you get to me?
listAsq.content: Usually same day, sometimes within a couple hours if you're close. We're always driving around Miami anyway, so if you're ready to sell and we're nearby, we can swing by pretty quick. Just depends where you are and what our schedule looks like that day.

free-house.title: Cash for used laptop Same Day
free-house.text:
Before taking your laptop to a pawn shop or spending weeks trying to sell it on marketplaces like Facebook, OfferUp, or eBay, take five minutes to get our offer — it may save you from regretting a low sale price in the future.

You can be assured that we will provide you with a clear, no-obligation cash offer for your laptop, with no spam, follow-up pressure, or unwanted calls afterward.

All information you share with us is kept strictly confidential and will never be disclosed to third parties.
